name: Psychedelic Shadow Base Alien Invasion Level 5
name_original: Psychedelic Shadow Base Alien Invasion Level 5
description:
All donations will go to Psychedelic Shadow - please support him if you are able to, thank you :)

Psychedelic Shadow is a gamer and is on Twitch: PsychedelicShadow as well as on Patreon and Youtube: Psychedelic Shadow. Any support on itch.io, Twitch, Patreon and subscribing to him on Youtube will be amazing :)

The full game has 5 levels. You use a jetpack to fly around the floating islands and platforms, collect different weapons and ammo, shoot and blow up aliens and drones and collect items to get to the portal in the building with the cosmic globe above.  

We have added this game's 5 levels as separate games. The full game is the toughest because it has all 5 levels to get through with the same amount of lives as single levels.  Single levels are great practice before taking on the tough 5 level game.

Psychedelic Shadow will soon be streaming this game and others of ours on Twitch :)

7-zip is a free unzipping program. When you have unzipped and opened the main folders you will find the application file that has the red GameGuru icon and you double click on that and the game will load. In the game's About section in the main menu it explains exactly what to do and gives you the game's controls.

Please also kindly help support us by donating to our itch.io games and subscribing to our Youtube channel, thank you :)

Our email address is grenadeware@gmail.com should you like to contact us.
